import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import './Hero.css'; const Hero = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{/* Bootstrap Carousel with MP4 Videos */}
{/* Hero Text Content */}

{t('heroTitle')}

{t('heroSubtitle')}

); }; export default Hero;
